sourcesContent: import Link from 'next/link' import { useState } from 'react' import { useAppHooks } from '../../context/AppContext' import { removeItemFromCart } from '../../utils/cart.util' import { productRawPrice } from '../../utils/product.util' const CartItem = ({ item, index }) => { const { useCart: [cart, setCart], useToast: [toast, setToast] } = useAppHooks() const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(item.quantity || 0) const handleClick = index => { setToast({ title: "Notification", body: "You successfully removed this product from your cart", role: "success" }) const updatedCart = removeItemFromCart(cart, index) setCart(updatedCart) } return ( handleClick(index)} > x {item.productVariation.name} {item.variation} {productRawPrice(item.productVariation.price)} € setQuantity(e.target.value >= 1 ? (+e.target.value) : 0)} /> {item.totalPrice} € ) } export default CartItem
